Implementation of the User-selectable Lit Wireframe draw style. More...

Constructors

 DzLitWireFrameStyle ()

Detailed Description

Implementation of the User-selectable Lit Wireframe draw style.

Items should draw a wire frame representation of their mesh with lighting enabled.
